info.name: Roblox Full-Width Black Game Page Theme
info.description:
False alarm, not broken, it all works, everything is fine, Just an extension I had messing with the layout.

Dark theme is recommended.
Stylus is recommended for use instead of Stylish

ATTENTION BTROBLOX USERS!
Make sure these settings are set to OFF:
Hide Ads = Off (Use adblock or something)
Keep Sidebar Open = Off
Entire Game Details Category = Off
https://i.imgur.com/L6rkNOu.png
info.additionalInfo:
Check out my new FANDOM Theme! https://userstyles.org/styles/180118/fandom-modern-full-width-theme

UPDATES:
- Feb, 13 / 20 - Now works at any width!

 - Jan, 3 / 20 - Fixed Social Link icons displaying the wrong icon + Spaced out social links better.

 - Dec, 3 / 19 - Better image preview + more polishing + Fixed youtube buttons unable to be clicked from shadow.

 - Dec, 1 / 19 (again) - Changed the look of badges + servers, + more polishing to make it look better :D (also ditched light theme, sorry.)

 - Dec, 1 / 19 - You can now press down on the image to see it in its proper form! (You can also always right click > view image)

 - Nov, 29 / 19 - Polishing + Fixed YT Cropping

 - Nov, 14 / 19 - Release

data.title: Unknown theme or theme does't show up
it does not work, unknown theme or something is incorrect, fix it
